hero.name: Rodrigo
hero.description: Full-stack developer specializing in the JavaScript ecosystem, creating modern web and mobile applications with React, Next.js, and React Native.

about.title: About Me
about.subtitle: Learn more about my journey, skills, and passion for web development.
about.story1: I'm Rodrigo, a passionate full-stack developer with deep expertise in the JavaScript ecosystem and over 7 years of experience in web development. My journey spans from crafting responsive web applications with React and Next.js to building cross-platform mobile apps with React Native.
about.story2: I specialize in modern web technologies with a strong focus on frontend development, particularly Next.js. Whether it's integrating payment systems with Stripe, managing content with Sanity, or building robust APIs with Node.js and Express, I bring comprehensive solutions to every project.
about.story3: My expertise also extends to traditional web development with WordPress and PHP, along with database design using MySQL, PostgreSQL, MongoDB, and modern tools like Prisma and Firebase.

skills.title: Skills & Technologies
skills.subtitle: A comprehensive overview of my technical expertise across the JavaScript ecosystem and beyond.
skills.learningSubtitle: Passionate about staying current with the latest technologies and best practices in web development.

contact.title: Get In Touch
contact.subtitle: Have a project in mind or want to collaborate? I'd love to hear from you. Let's create something amazing together.
contact.name: Name
contact.subject: Subject
contact.workTogetherDesc: I'm always open to discussing new opportunities and interesting projects.

footer.description: Full-stack developer specializing in the JavaScript ecosystem.
